des: "A quick and hearty meatless soup that doesn't take much time.  To really make this soup  hearty add leftover cooked pasta, pot roast or chicken."
ins: In a large stock pot combine tomato juice, potatoes, mixed vegetables, onion, bouillon cubes, water and season with pepper.  Bring to a boil and then simmer until potatoes are done, approximately 30 to 40 minutes.
